data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Zamfara, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Zamfara, Nigeria
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Zamfara, Nigeria to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Zamfara, Nigeria.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 928,065 believers in Zamfara to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 2,674,335 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Basa-Gurmana people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Basa-Gurmana people know you.
Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Zamfara, Nigeria so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Zamfara.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.section_summary:
the state of Zamfara, Nigeria has a population of 3,602,400.

We estimate Zamfara has 928,065 people who might know Jesus, 916,717 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,757,618 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 928,065 believers in the state of Zamfara to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.
